title: Lombo dos Canhas
body: A populated place in the parish of Canhas. There was the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Anunciação or da Incarnação, rebuilt in 1696 by João Rodrigues da Câmara and his wife D. Isabel César da Câmara, and which served as a parish church for some time.

Canhas: Parish where Lombo dos Canhas is located.

João Rodrigues da Câmara: Responsible for the rebuilding of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Anunciação.

1696: Year of the rebuilding of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Anunciação.
